column4: Any one know how to get around a lockup after the 2nd stage of the install.  There are no errors durring the boot procress, it just locks up on the beggening after it gets booted to the welcome screen to start system configuration?
the live cd wrks just fine, but the install cd is giveing me issues]
you could try to boot with acpi=off and see if it makes a difference
would it use the same boot settings I set on the first install process or would I have to give it the options at the 2nd stage boot process.
